protein.specific_function: Catalyzes the reverse reaction of mono-ADP-ribosylation.

go_class.description: hydrolase activity, acting on glycosyl bonds

reference.reference_text: Takada T, Iida K, Moss J: Cloning and site-directed mutagenesis of human ADP-ribosylarginine hydrolase. J Biol Chem. 1993 Aug 25;268(24):17837-43.
